quiz.question: ____ bulk
quiz.explanation: 大量, 运送大量货物. The company will ship bulk orders overseas. 公司将把大量订单运送到海外。

quiz.question: _______ hulk
quiz.explanation: 废船, 生锈的废船. A rusting hulk lay abandoned in the harbor. 一艘生锈的废船被遗弃在港口。

quiz.question: _____ mountebank
quiz.explanation: 江湖骗子, 江湖骗子医生. The quack mountebank sold fake remedies. 江湖骗子医生出售假药。

quiz.question: spank _ _____
quiz.explanation: 打屁股, 打孩子屁股. Parents debated whether to spank a child for misbehavior. 父母就是否因不当行为打孩子屁股而争论。

quiz.question: swank _____
quiz.explanation: 豪华的, 豪华酒店. They stayed at a swank hotel in Manhattan. 他们住在曼哈顿的一家豪华酒店。

quiz.question: shrink __ ____
quiz.explanation: 畏缩, 畏缩恐惧. The timid child would shrink in fear from strangers. 胆小的孩子会因陌生人而畏缩恐惧。

quiz.question: wink __
quiz.explanation: 眨眼, 对...眨眼. He would wink at her across the room. 他会从房间对面对她眨眼。

quiz.question: _ hunk __ _____
quiz.explanation: 大块, 一大块面包. He tore off a hunk of bread from the loaf. 他从面包上撕下一大块。

quiz.question: _ chunk __ ___
quiz.explanation: 厚块, 一大块冰. A chunk of ice broke off from the glacier. 一大块冰从冰川上断裂。

quiz.question: _______ skunk
quiz.explanation: 臭鼬, 条纹臭鼬. The striped skunk is known for its defensive spray. 条纹臭鼬以其防御性喷雾而闻名。

quiz.question: flunk _ ____
quiz.explanation: 不及格, 考试不及格. Students who don't study may flunk a test. 不学习的学生可能会考试不及格。

quiz.question: chipmunk _____
quiz.explanation: 花栗鼠, 花栗鼠脸颊. The chipmunk cheek bulged with stored nuts. 花栗鼠脸颊因储存的坚果而鼓起。

quiz.question: ____ spunk
quiz.explanation: 勇气, 展现勇气. The underdog team continued to show spunk. 处于劣势的球队继续展现勇气。

quiz.question: overlook _ ______
quiz.explanation: 忽略, 忽略细节. It's easy to overlook a detail in complex documents. 在复杂文件中很容易忽略细节。

quiz.question: brook __ _______
quiz.explanation: 容忍, 不容忍异议. The dictator would brook no dissent from subordinates. 独裁者不会容忍下属的异议。

quiz.question: bark ______
quiz.explanation: 吠叫, 大声吠叫. The guard dog would bark loudly at intruders. 看门狗会对入侵者大声吠叫。

quiz.question: debark __________
quiz.explanation: 下船, 让乘客下船. The crew prepared to debark passengers at the port. 船员准备在港口让乘客下船。

quiz.question: _____ hallmark
quiz.explanation: 特征, 品牌特征. Quality is the brand hallmark of luxury goods. 质量是奢侈品的品牌特征。

quiz.question: spark ________
quiz.explanation: 激发, 激发兴趣. The discovery helped spark interest in ancient history. 这一发现帮助激发了对古代历史的兴趣。

quiz.question: stark ________
quiz.explanation: 明显的, 明显的对比. The two paintings showed a stark contrast in style. 这两幅画在风格上显示出明显的对比。

quiz.question: ______ jerk
quiz.explanation: 猛拉, 突然的猛拉. The train stopped with a sudden jerk. 火车突然猛拉一下停了下来。

quiz.question: shirk ______________
quiz.explanation: 逃避, 逃避责任. Good leaders never shirk responsibility for mistakes. 好的领导者从不逃避错误的责任。

quiz.question: quirk __ ____
quiz.explanation: 怪癖, 命运的怪癖. Meeting her again was a strange quirk of fate. 再次遇见她是命运的怪癖。

quiz.question: ____ fretwork
quiz.explanation: 回纹细工, 花边回纹细工. The dress featured delicate lace fretwork. 这件连衣裙以精致的花边回纹细工为特色。

quiz.question: _____ obelisk
quiz.explanation: 方尖碑, 石方尖碑. The ancient stone obelisk stood in the plaza. 古老的石方尖碑矗立在广场上。

quiz.question: ________ asterisk
quiz.explanation: 星号, 脚注星号. A footnote asterisk marked additional information. 脚注星号标记了额外信息。

quiz.question: ______ kiosk
quiz.explanation: 售货亭, 售票亭. Passengers bought tickets at the ticket kiosk. 乘客在售票亭购买票。

quiz.question: ____ husk
quiz.explanation: 外壳, 玉米外壳. Remove the corn husk before cooking. 烹饪前去除玉米外壳。

quiz.question: ________ tusk
quiz.explanation: 象牙, 大象象牙. Poachers illegally hunt elephant tusk. 偷猎者非法猎取大象象牙。

quiz.question: hawk _ _______
quiz.explanation: 兜售, 兜售产品. Vendors would hawk a product on street corners. 小贩会在街角兜售产品。

quiz.question: ______ cabal
quiz.explanation: 阴谋集团, 秘密阴谋集团. A secret cabal plotted to overthrow the government. 一个秘密阴谋集团密谋推翻政府。

quiz.question: verbal _____
quiz.explanation: 言语的, 言语虐待. The employee suffered verbal abuse from the supervisor. 员工遭受主管的言语虐待。

quiz.question: methodical ________
quiz.explanation: 有条理的, 有条理的方法. The scientist used a methodical approach to research. 科学家使用有条理的方法进行研究。

quiz.question: ________ periodical
quiz.explanation: 期刊, 学术期刊. The professor published in an academic periodical. 教授在学术期刊上发表文章。

quiz.question: pontifical ____
quiz.explanation: 自以为是的, 自以为是的语气. His pontifical tone annoyed colleagues. 他自以为是的语气惹恼了同事。

quiz.question: pathological ____
quiz.explanation: 病态的, 病态的说谎者. The pathological liar couldn't distinguish truth from fiction. 病态的说谎者无法区分真假。

quiz.question: physiological ________
quiz.explanation: 生理的, 生理反应. Fear triggers a physiological response in the body. 恐惧在身体中触发生理反应。

quiz.question: tautological ____
quiz.explanation: 同义反复的, 同义反复的循环. The argument fell into a tautological loop. 论证陷入了同义反复的循环。

quiz.question: typographical _____
quiz.explanation: 排版的, 排版错误. The book contained several typographical error. 这本书包含几处排版错误。

quiz.question: cyclical ________
quiz.explanation: 周期性的, 周期性衰退. The economy experienced a cyclical downturn. 经济经历了周期性衰退。

quiz.question: diabolical ______
quiz.explanation: 恶魔般的, 恶魔般的阴谋. The villain hatched a diabolical scheme. 反派策划了一个恶魔般的阴谋。

quiz.question: polemical _____
quiz.explanation: 论战的, 论战性文章. The author wrote a polemical essay on politics. 作者写了一篇关于政治的论战性文章。

quiz.question: inimical __ ______
quiz.explanation: 有害的, 对健康有害的. Smoking is inimical to health. 吸烟对健康有害。

quiz.question: economical ___
quiz.explanation: 经济的, 经济型汽车. The economical car saves money on fuel. 经济型汽车节省燃料费用。

quiz.question: astronomical _____
quiz.explanation: 天文数字的, 天文数字的价格. The artwork sold for an astronomical price. 这件艺术品以天文数字的价格售出。

quiz.question: anatomical _____
quiz.explanation: 解剖的, 解剖模型. Medical students studied the anatomical model. 医学生研究解剖模型。

quiz.question: mechanical _______
quiz.explanation: 机械的, 机械故障. The plane crash was caused by mechanical failure. 飞机坠毁是由机械故障引起的。

quiz.question: ecumenical _______
quiz.explanation: 普世的, 普世会议. The ecumenical council brought together different faiths. 普世会议汇集了不同的信仰。

quiz.question: canonical ____
quiz.explanation: 经典的, 经典文本. Shakespeare's works are canonical text in English literature. 莎士比亚的作品是英国文学的经典文本。

quiz.question: empirical ________
quiz.explanation: 经验的, 经验证据. The theory was supported by empirical evidence. 该理论得到经验证据的支持。

quiz.question: metrical _______
quiz.explanation: 韵律的, 韵律模式. The poem followed a strict metrical pattern. 这首诗遵循严格的韵律模式。

quiz.question: lackadaisical ________
quiz.explanation: 懒散的, 懒散的态度. His lackadaisical attitude toward work was problematic. 他对工作懒散的态度是有问题的。

quiz.question: whimsical ____
quiz.explanation: 异想天开的, 异想天开的想法. The artist had a whimsical idea for the sculpture. 艺术家对雕塑有一个异想天开的想法。

quiz.question: nonsensical ______
quiz.explanation: 荒谬的, 荒谬的评论. He dismissed the proposal as a nonsensical remark. 他将该提议视为荒谬的评论而不予理会。

quiz.question: metaphysical ________
quiz.explanation: 形而上学的, 形而上学问题. Philosophers debate metaphysical question about existence. 哲学家辩论关于存在的形而上学问题。

quiz.question: alphabetical _____
quiz.explanation: 按字母顺序的, 按字母顺序. The dictionary lists words in alphabetical order. 字典按字母顺序列出单词。

quiz.question: hypothetical ________
quiz.explanation: 假设的, 假设的情景. The professor presented a hypothetical scenario. 教授提出了一个假设的情景。

quiz.question: heretical ____
quiz.explanation: 异端的, 异端观点. The church condemned his heretical view. 教会谴责了他的异端观点。

quiz.question: theoretical _________
quiz.explanation: 理论的, 理论框架. The study employed a strong theoretical framework. 该研究采用了强大的理论框架。

quiz.question: critical _________
quiz.explanation: 危急的, 危急状况. The patient remained in critical condition. 患者仍处于危急状况。

quiz.question: sceptical ____
quiz.explanation: 怀疑的, 怀疑的观点. Scientists took a sceptical view of the claims. 科学家对这些声明持怀疑的观点。

quiz.question: elliptical _____
quiz.explanation: 椭圆的, 椭圆轨道. Planets follow an elliptical orbit around the sun. 行星沿着围绕太阳的椭圆轨道运行。

quiz.question: vertical ____
quiz.explanation: 垂直的, 垂直轴. The graph shows data along the vertical axis. 图表沿垂直轴显示数据。

quiz.question: nautical _____
quiz.explanation: 航海的, 航海图. Sailors navigate using a nautical chart. 水手使用航海图导航。

quiz.question: pharmaceutical _______
quiz.explanation: 制药的, 制药公司. The pharmaceutical company developed new treatments. 制药公司开发了新的治疗方法。

quiz.question: lexical ____
quiz.explanation: 词汇的, 词汇项. The dictionary defines each lexical item precisely. 字典精确定义每个词汇项。

quiz.question: reciprocal _______
quiz.explanation: 相互的, 相互尊重. Good relationships require reciprocal respect. 良好的关系需要相互尊重。

quiz.question: univocal ____
quiz.explanation: 单义的, 单义术语. The scientific definition is a univocal term. 科学定义是一个单义术语。

quiz.question: ____ medal
quiz.explanation: 奖章, 金牌. The athlete won a gold medal at the Olympics. 运动员在奥运会上赢得了金牌。

quiz.question: pedal _____
quiz.explanation: 踏板, 踏板动力. The bicycle runs on pedal power alone. 自行车仅靠踏板动力运行。

quiz.question: _______ sandal
quiz.explanation: 凉鞋, 皮凉鞋. She wore comfortable leather sandal in summer. 她在夏天穿舒适的皮凉鞋。

quiz.question: heal ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 治愈, 治愈伤口. Time will help heal the wound both physically and emotionally. 时间将帮助治愈身体和情感上的伤口。

quiz.question: piecemeal ______
quiz.explanation: 零碎的, 零碎的改革. The government implemented piecemeal reform instead of comprehensive change. 政府实施零碎的改革而不是全面改革。

quiz.question: oatmeal ________
quiz.explanation: 燕麦片, 燕麦片粥. She ate warm oatmeal porridge for breakfast. 她早餐吃温暖的燕麦片粥。

quiz.question: lineal __________
quiz.explanation: 直系的, 直系后裔. He is a lineal descendant of the royal family. 他是王室的直系后裔。

quiz.question: repeal _ ___
quiz.explanation: 废除, 废除法律. Congress voted to repeal a law that was outdated. 国会投票废除一项过时的法律。

quiz.question: ____ appeal
quiz.explanation: 呼吁, 发出呼吁. The charity will make appeal for donations. 慈善机构将发出捐款呼吁。

quiz.question: _________ cereal
quiz.explanation: 谷物, 早餐谷物. Children enjoy eating breakfast cereal with milk. 孩子们喜欢吃加牛奶的早餐谷物。

quiz.question: sidereal ____
quiz.explanation: 恒星的, 恒星时. Astronomers use sidereal time for observations. 天文学家使用恒星时进行观测。

quiz.question: ethereal ______
quiz.explanation: 飘渺的, 飘渺的美丽. The dancer possessed an ethereal beauty. 舞者拥有飘渺的美丽。

quiz.question: funereal ____
quiz.explanation: 阴郁的, 阴郁的气氛. A funereal mood settled over the gathering. 阴郁的气氛笼罩着聚会。

quiz.question: arboreal _______
quiz.explanation: 树栖的, 树栖栖息地. Monkeys thrive in their arboreal habitat. 猴子在它们的树栖栖息地中茁壮成长。

quiz.question: incorporeal ______
quiz.explanation: 无形的, 无形的精神. Ghost stories speak of incorporeal spirit. 鬼故事讲述无形的精神。

quiz.question: empyreal _____
quiz.explanation: 天空的, 天空之光. The painting depicted empyreal light from heaven. 这幅画描绘了来自天堂的天空之光。

quiz.question: regal _______
quiz.explanation: 帝王的, 帝王气质. The queen maintained a regal bearing. 女王保持着帝王气质。

quiz.question: prodigal ___
quiz.explanation: 挥霍的, 浪子. The parable tells of the prodigal son who returned home. 寓言讲述了回家的浪子。

quiz.question: ____ madrigal
quiz.explanation: 情歌, 爱情牧歌. The choir performed a beautiful love madrigal. 合唱团演唱了一首美丽的爱情牧歌。

quiz.question: centrifugal _____
quiz.explanation: 离心的, 离心力. Centrifugal force pushes objects outward during rotation. 离心力在旋转期间将物体向外推。

quiz.question: conjugal ______
quiz.explanation: 婚姻的, 婚姻权利. The couple discussed their conjugal rights. 这对夫妇讨论了他们的婚姻权利。

quiz.question: apocryphal _____
quiz.explanation: 杜撰的, 杜撰的故事. The legend is probably an apocryphal story. 这个传说可能是一个杜撰的故事。

quiz.question: _____ marshal
quiz.explanation: 元帅, 陆军元帅. The field marshal commanded the entire army. 陆军元帅指挥整个军队。

quiz.question: connubial _____
quiz.explanation: 婚姻的, 婚姻幸福. The newlyweds enjoyed connubial bliss. 新婚夫妇享受婚姻幸福。

quiz.question: glacial ____
quiz.explanation: 极慢的, 极慢的步伐. The project moved forward at a glacial pace. 该项目以极慢的步伐向前推进。

quiz.question: judicial ______
quiz.explanation: 司法的, 司法审查. The court conducted a judicial review of the law. 法院对该法律进行了司法审查。

quiz.question: cordial _________
quiz.explanation: 友好的, 友好关系. The two nations maintained cordial relations. 两国保持友好关系。

quiz.question: vestigial ____
quiz.explanation: 退化的, 退化的尾巴. Humans have a vestigial tail called the coccyx. 人类有一个称为尾骨的退化尾巴。

quiz.question: parochial ____
quiz.explanation: 狭隘的, 狭隘的观点. His parochial view prevented understanding other cultures. 他狭隘的观点阻碍了对其他文化的理解。

quiz.question: filial ____
quiz.explanation: 孝顺的, 孝顺义务. Caring for elderly parents is a filial duty. 照顾年迈父母是孝顺义务。

quiz.question: genial ____
quiz.explanation: 和蔼的, 和蔼的主人. The genial host made everyone feel welcome. 和蔼的主人让每个人都感到受欢迎。

quiz.question: congenial _______
quiz.explanation: 意气相投的, 意气相投的同伴. She enjoyed spending time with congenial company. 她喜欢与意气相投的同伴共度时光。
